overview: Inspired by "A Sombra" from "Contos do Gin-Tonic" by MÃ¡rio-Henrique Leiria.  During the night, illusion arises from the synaptic processes of delirium. In the spell for clarity challenges arise from the relationship between body and mind. In this psychological universe of mental confusion, the shock induces distortion and changes in perception.
title: Sonho Tingido
